disabledMessages.noBalanceForDeposit: You have no {{ASSET}} in your wallet to deposit.

errorMessages.insufficientLamports: You are depositing all your SOL, leaving no lamports for transaction fees. Please enter a slightly lower amount.

disabledMessages.noDepositsForWithdraw: You have not deposited any {{ASSET}} to withdraw.

disabledMessages.noCollateralForBorrow: You must deposit collateral in order to borrow.

disabledMessages.noBalanceForSwap: You have no {{ASSET}} in your {{WALLET_OR_ACCOUNT}} to swap.

reviewMessages.marginSwapPartialReview: You're swapping {{AMOUNT}} {{INPUT_TOKEN}} and swapping {{MARGIN_AMOUNT}} {{INPUT_TOKEN}} ON MARGIN for {{SIZE}} {{OUTPUT_TOKEN}}.

disabledMessages.noBalanceForTransfer: You have no {{ASSET}} to transfer out of {{ACCOUNT_NAME}}.

errorMessages.overMaxMargin: You can only borrow up to {{MARGIN_AMOUNT}} {{MARGIN_ASSET}} on margin.

newAccount.title: New Account
newAccount.rentFeeInfo: The Solana Blockchain requires a one-time rent fee of {{RENT_FEE}} SOL for each new margin account.

disabledMessages.noSolForRentFee: You don't have enough SOL to cover the rent and transaction fees for a new account.

disabledMessages.aboveMaxRisk: Your Risk Level is too high. Deposit or repay your debt to avoid liquidation.

warningMessages.nearMaxRisk: This transaction brings your Risk Level to {{NEW_RISK}}, our maximum before liquidation is {{MAX_RISK}}.

errorMessages.maxRiskLevel: This transaction brings your Risk Level to {{NEW_RISK}}, and into liquidation territory.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.tpsDegraded: Solana network is experiencing degraded performance. Transactions may fail to send or confirm. (TPS: {{TPS}})
notifications.tpsSevere: Solana network is experiencing severe performance issues. Transactions will likely fail to send or confirm. (TPS: {{TPS}})

newAccount.successDescription: You opened a new account named {{ACCOUNT_NAME}}.
newAccount.failedDescription: Something went wrong, we were unable to create your new account. Please contact us or try again.
newAccount.cancelledDescription: You cancelled the creation of your new account.

editAccount.successDescription: You changed the name of {{OLD_ACCOUNT_NAME}} to {{NEW_ACCOUNT_NAME}}
editAccount.failedDescription: Something went wrong, we were unable to change your account name. Please contact us or try again.

actions.failedDescription: Something went wrong, your {{ACTION}} of {{AMOUNT}} {{ASSET}} was unsuccessful. Please contact us or try again.

orders.successDescription: Your {{TYPE}} order to {{SIDE}} {{AMOUNT}} {{BASE}} for {{PRICE}} {{QUOTE}} was successfully processed.
orders.failedDescription: Something went wrong, your {{TYPE}} order for {{AMOUNT}} {{BASE}} was unsuccessful. Please contact us or try again.

cancelOrder.failedDescription: Something went wrong, we were unable to cancel your order. Please contact us or try again.
cancelOrder.cancelledDescription: Your order ID {{ORDER_ID}} was not cancelled.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.disclaimerDetail: You are now entering Jet Protocol Mainnet. Do not proceed if you do not understand and accept the {{TERMS_LINK}}, {{PRIVACY_LINK}}, and the potential for financial loss.
disclaimer.acceptRisks: I understand and accept the risks.

geobanned.title: Geobanned
geobanned.regionNotAvailable: We're sorry, Jet Protocol is not currently available in your region.

rentFee.title: Rent Fee
rentFee.rentFeeDescription: I see this is your first time flying with Jet. Please note that to open your account, this transaction will include a refundable one-time rent fee. This is necessary for the Solana blockchain to store ongoing data related to your account. This fee is not collected by Jet Protocol.
rentFee.rentFeeDetail: The rent fee for your transaction is {{RENT_FEE}} SOL. This amount will be returned to when you {{TRADE_ACTION}} your full balance.

liquidation.title: Liquidation in Progress
liquidation.liquidationDetail: Liquidation has now begun on account {{ACCOUNT_NAME}}. To cease liquidation, you must deposit funds to {{BRING_RISK_DOWN}}.
liquidation.bringRiskDown: bring your Risk Level below 1.0 immediately

editAccount.title: Edit {{ACCOUNT_NAME}}
editAccount.nameAlreadyTaken: Account name '{{USED_NAME}}' is already in use.

orderEntry.title: Place Order
orderEntry.orderReview: You're placing a {{TYPE}} order to {{SIDE}} {{AMOUNT}} {{BASE_CURRENCY}} for {{SIZE}} {{QUOTE_CURRENCY}}.
orderEntry.shortSellingPartialReview: You're selling {{COLLATERAL_AMOUNT}} {{BASE_CURRENCY}} and SHORT SELLING {{SHORT_AMOUNT}} {{BASE_CURRENCY}} for {{SIZE}} {{QUOTE_CURRENCY}}.
orderEntry.buyingOnMarginPartialReview: You're buying {{COLLATERAL_AMOUNT}} {{BASE_CURRENCY}} and BUYING {{MARGIN_AMOUNT}} {{BASE_CURRENCY}} on MARGIN for {{SIZE}} {{QUOTE_CURRENCY}}.

candleStickChart.title: Candle Stick Chart
candleStickChart.exchangeDisclaimer: Note: Data shown may differ slightly from Serum-specific data.

errorMessages.noMarketDescription: We were unable to load the Serum marketplace at this time. Please contact us or try again later.

errors.noPoolsDetail: We're having trouble loading our pools right now, please contact us or try again later.

accountsView.title: Accounts
accountsView.fullAccountsLink: You are viewing {{CURRENT_PAIR}} only. For all trades on this account, visit your {{ACCOUNTS_LINK}} page.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.worldOfDefi: Connect your wallet to the world of DeFi.

notificationsModal.title: Notifications
notificationsModal.riskLevelDescription: Recieve notifications when your account risk rises into liquidation territory.

welcome.title: Welcome Aboard Pilot
welcome.description: DeFi can be confusing, so we've added this interacive Flight School to help you out. I'm your Copilot and I'm here to show you around.

aboutJet.title: 1. What can I do with Jet?
aboutJet.description: Jet's primary dashboards are Pools and Trade. With Pools, you can lend your crypto to earn yield or borrow against it at a competitive rate.
aboutJet.extraDescription: The Trade dashboard allows you to trade on Serum, with the option to utilize the power of Leverage through your Margin Accounts.

walletButton.title: 2. Connect your wallet
walletButton.description: In order to use those assets in your crypto wallet, you'll have to connect it to the dashboard.

accountSnapshot.title: 3. Account Snapshot
accountSnapshot.description: The Account Snapshot is your best friend, and follows you around the app.
accountSnapshot.detail: Here you can create new Margin Accounts, and switch between them.

pairSelector.title: 4. Pair Selector
pairSelector.description: Here you can select which asset pair you'd like to trade, and see up-to-date market data.

orderbook.title: 5. The Orderbook
orderbook.description: This is where the magic happens, an up to date visual on the current Bids, Asks, and Market Price from the Serum DEX.
orderbook.detail: TIP: As orders are placed, they'll populate this book. If you click on one of the rows, it will prefill the price so you can place a similar order.

recentTrades.title: 6. Recent Trades
recentTrades.description: A table of the latest filled orders from the Serum orderbook.
recentTrades.detail: TIP: You can click on any price to prefill it in the Order Entry.

orderEntry.title: 7. Order Entry
orderEntry.description: This is your ultimate tool within the Trade dashboard. Place Limit and Market orders to your exact specifications.
orderEntry.detail: TIP: As you fill in the information of your order, we'll recap it for you at the bottom to make sure it's exactly what you want.

candleStickChart.title: 8. Candlestick Chart
candleStickChart.description: In depth analysis of an assets Opening, Closing, High, and Low prices for a particular timeframe and period.
candleStickChart.detail: TIP: Use the tools on the right side of the chart to change the view and data timeframe / period.

pairRelatedAccount.title: 9. Pair Related Account
pairRelatedAccount.description: An accounting of your current Balances, Orders, and Fills related to the market pair you're trading.
pairRelatedAccount.detail: TIP: Use the Accounts page to your advantage for more in-depth data and history on all your positions.

poolsTable.title: 10. Pools Table
poolsTable.description: The Pools Table is the centerpiece of the Pools dashboard, allowing you to select any supported tokens to either lend and earn yield, or borrow against your deposited collateral.
poolsTable.detail: Think of pools like the 'take a penny, leave a penny' bowl at your local grocery store. Anybody can contribute, anybody can benefit.

poolDetail.title: 11. Pool Detail
poolDetail.description: This is a more in-depth look at the currently selected Pool. View price history and utilization statistics that will help you make an informed decision.

radar.title: 12. Radar
radar.description: Radar is where you come to compare Lending and Borrowing rates across different Solana protocols.

fullAccountHistory.title: 13. Account History Table
fullAccountHistory.description: This is where you can find detailed and useful data on your orders, positions, balances and transaction histories.
fullAccountHistory.detail: TIP: Click on a transaction in the table to view it on your preferred Block Explorer.

fullAccountBalance.title: 14. Account Balances Table
fullAccountBalance.description: Similar to the Pair Related Account table on the Trade dashboard, this table is a representation of your account's asset balances.

settingsBtn.title: 15. Settings
settingsBtn.description: Make this your preferred dashboard by adjusting your settings, switching between Solana clusters, and even updating your RPC endpoint.
settingsBtn.detail: TIP: If you ever want to revisit Flight School, you can enroll any time in your Settings modal.

notificationsBtn.title: 16. Notifications
notificationsBtn.description: Through our integration with Dialect, you can receive on-chain notifications, so you can keep your positions healthy even in turbulent market conditions.

end.title: Happy Flying
end.description: Looks like you're ready to take to the skies. If you have any feedback or questions feel free to contact us on our Discord.
end.detail: FINAL TIP: Veteran pilots like to have complete control over their dashboard, so we've added arrow buttons on every component allowing you to reorganize Jet to your liking.
